拜.definition: to bow to; to pay one's respects; (bound form) to extend greetings (on a specific occasion); to make a courtesy call; (bound form) (of a monarch) to appoint sb to (a position) by performing a ceremony; to acknowledge sb as one's (master, godfather etc); (used before some verbs to indicate politeness)

拜你所賜.definition: (derog.) this is all thanks to you!; well, thanks a lot!

拜倒.definition: to prostrate oneself; to fall on one's knees; to grovel

拜別.definition: (formal) to take leave of sb; to bid farewell

拜占庭.definition: Byzantium; Byzantine or Eastern Roman empire (395-1453)

拜城.definition: Bay nahiyisi (Baicheng county) in Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区[A1 ke4 su1 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

拜城縣.definition: Bay nahiyisi (Baicheng county) in Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区[A1 ke4 su1 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang

拜堂.definition: ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony; same as 拜天地

拜壽.definition: congratulate an elderly person on his birthday; offer birthday felicitations

拜天地.definition: to worship heaven and earth; ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony; also called 拜堂

拜師.definition: to formally become an apprentice to a master

拜年.definition: to pay a New Year call; to wish sb a Happy New Year

拜懺.definition: to hold a daytime Buddhist mass; (of a monk or nun) to read scripture to atone for sb's sins

拜拜.definition: to pay one's respects by bowing with hands in front of one's chest clasping joss sticks, or with palms pressed together; (Tw) religious ceremony in which offerings are made to a deity

拜會.definition: (often used in the context of diplomacy) to meet with; to pay a visit to; to call on

拜望.definition: to call to pay one's respect; to call on

拜泉.definition: Baiquan county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

拜泉縣.definition: Baiquan county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

拜登.definition: Biden (name); Joe Biden (1942-), US president (2021-), vice-president 2009-2017

拜祭.definition: to worship; to observe religious rites; to pay one's respects (to one's ancestors etc)

拜科努爾.definition: Baikonur (Russian space launch site in Kazakhstan)

拜科努爾航天發射基地.pinyin: Bai4 ke1 nu3 er3 Hang2 tian1 Fa1 she4 Ji1 di4

拜節.definition: to pay respects during a festival

拜見.definition: to pay a formal visit; to call to pay respects; to meet one's senior or superior

拜託.definition: to request sb to do sth; please!

拜訪.definition: to pay a visit; to call on

拜認.definition: to formally accept sb as (one's adoptive mother, one's master etc)

拜謁.definition: to pay a formal visit; to call to pay respects; to pay homage (at a monument, mausoleum etc)

拜金.definition: to worship money; to be mad about money
